import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductPage=()=>{const{category,productId}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProduct=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("/api/".concat(category,"/").concat(productId));if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Network response was not ok");}const data=await response.json();setProduct(data);setIsLoading(false);}catch(error){setError(error.message);setIsLoading(false);}};fetchProduct();},[category,productId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price]})]})});};export default ProductPage;
